leading-relaxed","children":"明月几时有？把酒问青天。"}],["$","blockquote","5",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"不知天上宫阙，今夕是何年。"}],["$","blockquote","6",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"我欲乘风归去，又恐琼楼玉宇，高处不胜寒。"}],["$","blockquote","7",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"起舞弄清影，何似在人间。"}],["$","blockquote","8",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"转朱阁，低绮户，照无眠。"}],["$","blockquote","9",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"不应有恨，何事长向别时圆？"}],["$","blockquote","10",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"人有悲欢离合，月有阴晴圆缺，此事古难全。"}],["$","blockquote","11",{"className":"border-l-4 border-stone-400 pl-4 my-6 text-stone-700 italic text-lg leading-relaxed","children":"但愿人长久，千里共婵娟。"}],["$","hr","12",{"className":"my-8 border-stone-200"}],["$","h2","13",{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-stone-800 mt-8 mb-4 pb-2 border-b border-stone-200","children":"千古名句"}],["$","p","14",{"className":"font-semibold text-stone-800 my-4 text-lg","children":"\"但愿人长久，千里共婵娟\""}],["$","p","15",{"className":"text-stone-600 leading-relaxed my-4","children":"只愿人们（这里指弟弟苏辙）能够平安长久，即使相隔千里，也能共同欣赏这美好的月光。这是中秋望月怀人之作，表达了对亲人的美好祝愿，成为中秋望月怀人时经常被引用的名句。"}],["$","hr","16",{"className":"my-8 border-stone-200"}],["$","h2","17",{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-stone-800 mt-8 mb-4 pb-2 border-b border-stone-200","children":"创作背景"}],["$","p","18",{"className":"text-stone-600 leading-relaxed my-4","children":"这首词是公元1076年（宋神宗熙宁九年）中秋作者在密州时所作。词前的小序说：\"丙辰中秋，欢饮达旦，大醉，作此篇，兼怀子由。\"当时苏轼因与王安石政见不合，自请外任，出守密州。"}],["$","hr","19",{"className":"my-8 border-stone-200"}],["$","div","20",{"className":"mt-8 pt-4 border-t border-stone-200","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","0",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-stone-100 text-stone-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"中秋"}],"$Lf","$L10","$L11","$L12"]}]}]]}]}]}],"$L13"]}]
